page.title: 03HAMBLEDON HILL NEAR SHROTON
page.content: IN THE LAST 20 YEARS{ARCHAEOLOGISTS HAVE EXCAVATED THIS HILL AND FOUND OBJECTS LEFT BY EARLY MAN. THERE WERE TOOLS, BONES AND THE FOUNDATIONS OF HUTS THAT WERE ONCE PROTECTED BY THE HIGH RAMPARTS WHICH SURROUND THE HILL. {IRON AGE MAN}KNEW THAT HIS ENEMIES COULD NOT REACH HIM UP HERE IF THEY HAD TO CROSS THESE RIDGES MADE OUT OF THE CHALK. UP HERE HE COULD LIVE SAFELY AND WATCH FOR ANYONE APPROACHING THROUGH THE SURROUNDING FORESTS. { OLIVER CROMWELL}ALSO FOUGHT A BATTLE HERE AGAINST THE DORSET CLUBMEN IN THE CIVIL WAR. AFTER HIS VICTORY HE LOCKED 400 PRISONERS IN SHROTON CHURCH FOR THE NIGHT. { GENERAL WOLFE}WHO CAPTURED QUEBEC FOR THE BRITISH TRAINED HIS ARMY HERE AND THEY CAMPED AT THE FOOT OF THE HILL, THE AREA NOW CALLED SHROTON LINES.
